details.title: Rough class on a completely distributive lattice
details.abstract: This paper generalizes the Pawlak rough set method to a completely distributive lattice. The concept of a rough set has many applications in data mining. The approximation operators on a completely distributive lattice are studied, the rough class on a completely distributive lattice is defined and the expressional theorems of the rough class are proven. These expressional theorems are used to prove that the collection of all rough classes is an atomic completely distributive lattice.
